Posts.Content: Apr 24, 2015 03:52PM CaliRN wrote: I have steri-strips on my inframammary incisions and my donar site incisions. I was told not to remove them but to let them fall off on there own. It has been 3 weeks and some of the donar site tape has come off but the rest are sticking around a while longer...unfortunately.
Posts.Title: Tegaderm tape removal Nancdancer Sunflowercat

Posts.Content: Jun 5, 2015 07:00PM CaliRN wrote: Hi Mizmimi, I was 43 when I was diagnosed back in September and also had implants prior to my surgery. I had a nipple sparing double mastectomy with tissue expanders in December. In April I had my exchange surgery. I'm so sorry that you are dealing with this but know that it does get a lot better. Let me know if you have any questions:)
Posts.Title: Age 44. DCIS Stage 0. Decided on Double Mx. MizMimi MizMimi
